snippet.title: How to Code ASCII Art in Java
snippet.description:
New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast
- In this video, I show you how to make an animated running person using ASCII art! This tutorial will show you how to code ascii art in java.

I like to take a break from learning and just program something that I enjoy. As a kid I've always loved ascii art. In eighth grade I chose to do a picture of the United States in ascii art and I had my own stash of ascii art creations I made in Microsoft word on my laptop.

I hope you enjoyed this java ascii art tutorial on creating your own animated ascii art! I really enjoy making videos like this so I'll probably do a lot more project tutorials like this one :)

Do you want to learn how to code from scratch? Check out my video on How to Code for Beginners in 2018: https://youtu.be/woJb2hAfkO0

What did you add to your running animation? Did you face any challenges when making this ascii art?

🌅 Source code: https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/ASCIIArt/Running.java -

7 Tips on How To Think Like a Programmer: https://manychat.com/l2/102224234605534
New Programmer Support: https://www.facebook.com/groups/616837729085352
Java Students Unite: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2414953521949898/
